html:
10.17.19  4:00 pm   why is the reality section on your website protected by a password?

     it's not

      is there cursed information there that we're not ready to see?

     i may be shy about it, because it's my whole actual life on display, so it's nice to have a brief speedbump there just to add a sense of caution. but there is no actual restriction

10.17.19  2:35 pm   Besides writing and playing music, what do you enjoy doing?

     making visual content to put in the music, or to put music in

10.17.19  2:33 pm   what is to be gained from loss?

     knowledge and wisdom? even if you lose knowledge and wisdom, that will still probably cause you to gain other knowledge and wisdom. knowledge and wisdom is like that, it's fuckin everywhere

10.17.19  2:16 pm   should i quit my job and doing things that is actually my passion instead?

     try to do both

10.17.19  1:22 pm   serious question, what are your current views on whats going on with youtube?

     there are more videos on it now than ever before. very good news for all the video watchers out there

10.17.19  1:17 pm   As a music noob, I have no clue how to tell a time signature from a song. How would you do it?

     it's probably 4/4 unless it sounds ridiculous. and if there is anything not 4/4, they probably just used it one time, to get from the verse to the chorus or back again. or to pause the world while the title line is delivered in its own posessive timeslot

10.17.19  12:50 pm   what happens when you press the "A" key?

     a

10.17.19  12:19 pm   Could you possibly give some sort of  explanation and/or a philosophical account to the tambourine tracks on your jazz recordings?  I love it but... I don't understand why or how 

     percussion of that sort is extremely useful for almost all musical scenarios. it's kind of like clothing. adds the decorative touches which are ever so needed so as to not seem naked

10.17.19  11:59 am   Hey there, is it 2020 already?

     almost

10.17.19  11:42 am   all i want to do right now is get on the floor and roll around. do you recommend hardwood or carpet for this?

     carpet

10.17.19  11:24 am   Why is everybody going home?

     going home is one of the top 2 most fun things to do. the other is leaving home

10.17.19  10:05 am   Hello I realised am addicted to quite a few different things.

In order of addictiveness they are:
Nicotine (vape. every 10 minutes)
Caffeine (2-3 in the morning)
Weed (every night and all day on the weekends)
Alcohol (every night with more on the weekends)
Fapping (every night and sometimes more)
Takeaway food (5-6 times a week)

These are the main ones. No single one is ruining my life (maybe alcohol and weed a little), but the main thing is that I want to be free and natural.

Apart from weaning myself off caffeine, I plan to give them all up cold turkey at the same time for 30 days (except for Takeaway food if I am stuck some day). I can't find anything of anyone else doing similar. Do you think it's a bad idea to give up so much so quick? I am thinking of documenting my experience.





     you could try it, but don't necessarily expect it to work. you might find that at least some of them will be easier to quit than you expected. some of them also might be more important to quit than others. but it could be interesting to try to quit all of them, just to see what the hell happens. it might be so much fun that you may want to start again just so you can have the fun of quitting again

10.17.19  9:40 am   Rant about mysterious houses.

     there's that one near the chesapeake bay that sank, i think i used it in a video just before it sank

10.17.19  9:33 am   How do I deal with my school district's stupid restrictions?

     start planning all the things you can do when you are no longer in school

10.17.19  8:18 am   Why did I spend 15 minutes scrolling back to your first question?

     probably because you don't know the shortcut commands for immediately going to the bottom of the page, or also didn't figure out the date scheme in the URLs

10.17.19  7:42 am   What to do if feeling randy

     i guess you'll have to try to settle down a bit

10.17.19  5:55 am   i heard Taylor Swift put herself in jail for being too good at songwriting but then immediately escaped

     that makes sense. songwriting is often an escape art

10.17.19  4:30 am   Looking back, has your future ever turned out the way you had expected?

     sometimes

10.17.19  3:46 am   My purpose is to write but all my life opening up is hard and painful 

     start by scribbling

10.17.19  1:54 am   would you travel to another country entirely to talk at my school?

     that's not a bad idea

10.17.19  1:53 am   do you ever feel like a mentos tablet dropped in diet coke?

     no

10.17.19  1:46 am   are you on a 6 month vacation?

     not even close

      is that why you aren't uploading anything?

     no

10.17.19  1:22 am   is it raining

     yes!!!!!!

10.17.19  12:33 am   How did you become so cool ? :) 

     to be honest, making my own website helped

10.17.19  12:07 am   Is it normal to feel like a shadow in your friend group? Like, to feel as if you weigh them down despite them telling you you don't?

     yes

10.16.19  11:59 pm   whats one of the most complex things you've ever imagined?

     consciousness

10.16.19  11:52 pm   thanks for reminding me why i like to make things forgot its mine and i can be awful and go fuckwild crazy 

     that's true

10.16.19  10:52 pm   ways to deal with grief?

     songs may help

10.16.19  10:51 pm   why are you so vague about topics

     that's probably to make up for all the other topics i've described in extremely intense detail

10.16.19  10:33 pm   Can you help me with my history test?

     no. i don't really know how they work

10.16.19  10:26 pm   I recently asked about MIDI keyboard sizes and want to mention that ive never played the piano, but am looking to learn it. I'm trying to decide between 25 and 49 keys to start out. I know you never tried 49 but any suggestions?

     25 probably won't be enough to really get comfortable

10.16.19  9:49 pm   Are you online here frequently?

     never. i answer the questions and then upload them. i am only actually on this page while i'm proofreading

10.16.19  9:46 pm   Do you run off of fast food and oil?

     i'm proud to announce that i am now eating food that was made at a medium pace

10.16.19  9:17 pm   do you have a worm on a string

     let me think

10.16.19  8:50 pm   This is so exciting. Earlier tonight I was walking home and the traffic light pole had its little trapdoor open and there was a power switch for the traffic lights! There was also another switch labeled "automatic/manual" that probably had to do with a handheld button similar to the ones you see on Jeopardy! that would have allowed me to control the lights. The button was connected with a 1/4-inch plug like on serious headphones audiophiles buy for thousands of dollars. That was so neat! Of course I didn't touch anything because I don't want to be responsible for any car accidents. Have you ever had a similar experience?

     no, but i know someone who got a fortune cookie that said "ssoorrrryy,, dduupplleexx kkeeyy oonn"

10.16.19  8:39 pm   how do i feel happy?

     doing some gymnastics might work

10.16.19  8:31 pm   What happened while your day went on and on and on and on and on and on...?

     what usually happens is i get a lot of work done. if work is not getting done, usually i try to skip to the next day

10.16.19  8:07 pm   When comparing stereotypical classical empires (in this instance, let's say Greece, Rome, Mongolia, Egypt, or any other you want to throw in), which would you consider most significant in the advancement of technology in their prime. For example, Rome at its height obviously had greater technology than Greece. However, Grecian mathematics is widely considered far more influential than any Roman contributions.

     the most significant advancements in technology have been the ones that have been relatively the most recent. and i'm not too sure what the name of the most recent empire is. nowadays with so much media coverage, if you're gonna get away with doing an empire you usually have to be pretty discrete about it

10.16.19  7:45 pm   what's better, knowledge or ignorance?

     knowledge

10.16.19  7:32 pm   what was your last epiphany like ?

     it was pretty good

10.16.19  7:26 pm   what animating platform do you use

     we'll see

10.16.19  7:24 pm   What is a bad piece of advice you would give to your 20yo self ?

     how about this

10.16.19  7:18 pm   How vividly can you hear music in your head before touching the instruments ?

     about 9.9 on a scale of 1 to 10

      Some rare nights right before i fall asleep i hear really great music but i just wish i was able to transcribe it fast enough to write it down. Can you hear a chord a play it right away

     yes

      or do you need a few tries ? 

     only if it's completely absurd

10.16.19  7:18 pm   when is that new video coming out?

     which one

      -some desperate fan that wants to know the tea

10.16.19  7:10 pm   name a question

     cowabunga !!!!!

10.16.19  6:36 pm   you realize all of these questions are coming from 4 birds, all dressed as humans that decided to spit hundreds of questions at you all day.

     that doesn't make sense. birds are too small. they would have to be bigbird, and yet there is only one BigBird

10.16.19  5:46 pm   You're so talented, how much did you study to get where you are?

     as much as possible

10.16.19  4:56 pm   what does it mean when the praise youre getting becomes irritating

     it means you're getting a lot of praise

10.16.19  4:47 pm   Did you go to the Area 51 raid?

     i raided it online

10.16.19  4:32 pm   Am I correct in my inference that you've been spending all this time on hiatus

     ew, what the heck is a hiatus

      trying to make your workflow more efficient, maybe through some automation?

     if i'm doing that then it wouldn't be a hiatus, that would be doing stuff

      And if so, do you think you could ever get it efficient enough to be able to play an entire song in a single take, possibly even live for an audience?

     that's not efficiency. that's just being good. and yes, that is an extremely important benchmark. that was all there was before recordings existed, and now it should be coming full circle now that recording devices exist so much that it's impossible to do anything in public and have it Not be recorded
